captions.text: I see that Nuri has a speed deficit in his defensive midfield.
Because he put himself into his team.
Therefore, I put my main focus on the offense.
I like having the opportunity to play with Legends.
I decided to put Maldini and Pele in my starting line-up.
Goelkeeper, come on!
There it is!
I'll beat Marco with his own weapons, because I put him in my team.
But well played!
Short-pass play and fast combinations to get through the midfield
that's my kind of game and thats what I'll try to do on the console as well.
Yes, there it is! There it is!
There it is…
Make it. Yes!
That's a goal!
This is so ridiculous!
So Ridiculous! So Ridiculous!
Yes man! I'm back again!
I can't believe it! I can't believe it!
Yes! I caught up a 3 - 0!
This was my goal!
Yes, there it is!
What a bad goal!
It's over! - I can't believe it!
If the game went on for five more minutes, I would have equalized.
I almost caught up a 4-0. But I think, Musti deserved to win!
